caption.p: The crystal structure of COVID-19 M pro in complex with RZG (methyl 4-sulfamoylbenzoate). a Cartoon representation of protomer A of the dimeric M pro-inhibitor complex. b Surface representation of the Protomer A. Domain I is in purple, domain II is in blue, and domain III is in salmon-red. RZG is presented as green sticks. c A close view of the substrate-binding pocket. The key residues forming the binding pocket are shown as grey sticks
